00157 class TimeTextCtrlAx: public wxWindowAccessible
00158 {
00159 public:
00160    TimeTextCtrlAx(wxWindow * window);
00161 
00162    virtual ~ TimeTextCtrlAx();
00163 
00164    // Performs the default action. childId is 0 (the action for this object)
00165    // or > 0 (the action for a child).
00166    // Return wxACC_NOT_SUPPORTED if there is no default action for this
00167    // window (e.g. an edit control).
00168    virtual wxAccStatus DoDefaultAction(int childId);
00169 
00170    // Retrieves the address of an IDispatch interface for the specified child.
00171    // All objects must support this property.
00172    virtual wxAccStatus GetChild( int childId, wxAccessible** child );
00173 
00174    // Gets the number of children.
00175    virtual wxAccStatus GetChildCount(int* childCount);
00176 
00177    // Gets the default action for this object (0) or > 0 (the action for a child).
00178    // Return wxACC_OK even if there is no action. actionName is the action, or the empty
00179    // string if there is no action.
00180    // The retrieved string describes the action that is performed on an object,
00181    // not what the object does as a result. For example, a toolbar button that prints
00182    // a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document."
00183    virtual wxAccStatus GetDefaultAction( int childId, wxString *actionName );
00184 
00185    // Returns the description for this object or a child.
00186    virtual wxAccStatus GetDescription( int childId, wxString *description );
00187 
00188    // Gets the window with the keyboard focus.
00189    // If childId is 0 and child is NULL, no object in
00190    // this subhierarchy has the focus.
00191    // If this object has the focus, child should be 'this'.
00192    virtual wxAccStatus GetFocus( int *childId, wxAccessible **child );
00193 
00194    // Returns help text for this object or a child, similar to tooltip text.
00195    virtual wxAccStatus GetHelpText( int childId, wxString *helpText );
00196 
00197    // Returns the keyboard shortcut for this object or child.
00198    // Return e.g. ALT+K
00199    virtual wxAccStatus GetKeyboardShortcut( int childId, wxString *shortcut );
00200 
00201    // Returns the rectangle for this object (id = 0) or a child element (id > 0).
00202    // rect is in screen coordinates.
00203    virtual wxAccStatus GetLocation( wxRect& rect, int elementId );
00204 
00205    // Gets the name of the specified object.
00206    virtual wxAccStatus GetName( int childId, wxString *name );
00207 
00208    // Returns a role constant.
00209    virtual wxAccStatus GetRole( int childId, wxAccRole *role );
00210 
00211    // Gets a variant representing the selected children
00212    // of this object.
00213    // Acceptable values:
00214    // - a null variant (IsNull() returns TRUE)
00215    // - a list variant (GetType() == wxT("list"))
00216    // - an integer representing the selected child element,
00217    //   or 0 if this object is selected (GetType() == wxT("long"))
00218    // - a "void*" pointer to a wxAccessible child object
00219    virtual wxAccStatus GetSelections( wxVariant *selections );
00220 
00221    // Returns a state constant.
00222    virtual wxAccStatus GetState(int childId, long* state);
00223 
00224    // Returns a localized string representing the value for the object
00225    // or child.
00226    virtual wxAccStatus GetValue(int childId, wxString* strValue);
00227 
00228 private:
00229    TimeTextCtrl *mCtrl;
00230 };
